effect.diamond_pearl: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.platinum: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.platinum: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid eliminates the effect of the foe’s ability.
flavor_text.platinum: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid eliminates the effect of the foe’s ability.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid eliminates the effect of the foe’s ability.
